description: Key used to store the field value in the form state
Label displayed for the form field
Determines whether the field is required. If false, the value will be empty when the form is submitted without input
Disables the form field when set to true
Additional helper text or validation feedback for the field. Overrides the default validation message if provided
Validation status of the input field. Typically used together with the helper property
Specifies the size of the input field
Determines whether the picker is a single-value selector or a range selector
Specifies the type of date unit to pick (e.g., day, week, month, quarter, year)
Function to disable specific dates from selection. See Ant Design docs for usage: https://ant.design/components/date-picker#date-picker-demo-disabled-date
Function to disable specific time ranges from selection. See Ant Design docs for usage: https://ant.design/components/date-picker#date-picker-demo-disabled-date
